features: 14 essential nutrients (including vitamin A, B6, B12, C, D3, E, Zinc, Folic Acid, Biotin and more) in delicious multivitamin gummies for kids

These kids gummy vitamins are vegetarian friendly (no gelatin) and free of common allergens such as gluten, milk, eggs, wheat, soy, peanut, and tree nuts

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Pure Ingredients We take our choices of ingredients very seriously, opting to select only the premium quality ingredients that are the most effective, while taking into account the body's natural ability to absorb them to maximum extent. Within our selection, combinations of supplements such as our European Raw Elderberry, daily dose of Zinc, & Vitamin C, will reliably protect you from getting cold and boost you and your family’s immunity, providing you with powerful resistance. 4 Season Protection and Daily Vitamin complex In order to ensure multi-seasonal effectiveness, our supplements provide optimal nutrient absorption and utilization to provide the immune system and to enrich your body with Vitamins and minerals needed for Healthy Development with the essential building blocks it needs for combating seasonal allergies or helping raise the body’s natural defenses. Hypoallergenic for Sensitive Types Our body strengthening and immune support formula is safe and effective for the whole family, whether children or adults. That’s why we’ve developed our supplements to be allergen friendly and suitable for ages of 4 years or older. Supplement is crafted: all-natural, non-GMO, nut allergen free, fish allergen free, gluten free, gelatin free, soy free, & vegetarian friendly.

Innovating the New Path To Supplements Our company is the direct result of traditional recipes bioengineered and integrated with modern science. We strive to provide whole, full nutritional value through our curated line of supplements that continue to pioneer, innovate, and solve bodily food degradation problems that countless people experience across the globe. We make nutrient absorption easy on your system, providing supplements that're designed for full bodily development, and protection against harmful irritants. In recent years, we’ve shifted our efforts not only towards creating innovative formulas, but refining their strength, with ingredients grown in ecologically clean regions, to obtain powerful, safe, and effective supplements that simply work. We never stop at what has been achieved, constantly improving research and refining our formulas. Dr. Moritz - Family Supplements!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My kids (and I) have tried many different chewable vitamins. These are everyone's favorite! Will be buying these every time now. This won't apply to most but, they are very soft (which we all like); soft enough that I can even eat them with my dentures out. Lol.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These vitamins are very well for toddlers ages 2-4 keeps them healthy and growing strong

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My husband needs both vitamins and he does not take pills well. These gummies work best.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not the best flavor, but still better than pills
reviews.reviewText: I got these because I don't like taking pills and because I like raspberry. I didn't love these -- the texture and flavor aren't quite ideal, but my guess is that the texture thing is because they don't contain gelatin. I prefer the Nature Made gummies, which have images of raspberries and cherries on the label.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The value for the price, this is great so far so good.
reviews.reviewText: I liked the product because it's easy for a seven year old to take on the go. There isn't anything that I don't like about the product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The importance of giving kid's vitamins is just as important as we adults take them the kid loves them besides it's her only source to candy every day

reviews.reviewText: My son hates anything vitamins..... tried different ones but this one he kept asking for more so I had to eventually hide the bottle. Will definitely be setting up autoshipping for future orders. I'm a happy mommy and he loves these.
